--- title: preprocessing keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This module comprises all preprocessing techniques applied to software artifacts:" ---

df_to_txt_file[source]

df_to_txt_file(df, output, cols)

Converts a dataframe and converts it into a text file that SentencePiece can use to train a BPE model

gen_sp_model[source]

gen_sp_model(df, output, model_name, cols=None)

Trains a SentencePiece BPE model from a pandas dataframe

dummy_data = {
        'first': ['1', '2', '6', '7', '8'],
        'second': ['K', 'M', 'O', 'Q', 'S'],
        'third': ['L', 'N', 'P', 'R', 'T']}

df = pd.DataFrame(dummy_data2); df
id Feature1 Feature2
0 1 K L
1 2 M N
2 6 O P
3 7 Q R
4 8 S T 
df_to_txt_file(df, Path('./test_data'), list(df.columns))

PosixPath('test_data/text.txt')
path = Path("./test_data")
model_name = "test"

gen_sp_model(df, path, model_name, list(df.columns))

spm = sp.SentencePieceProcessor()
spm.Load(str(path/f"{model_name}.model"))

True
spm.EncodeAsPieces("Hello, world!")

['▁', 'Hello,', '▁', 'world!']
